Hi there, 

I am planning to create an application of CPPNs that generate 3=
D 
tetrahedral meshes to be used in physically-based simulations... The 
CP=
PN will output material presence along with material properties like 
Young=
's modulus (elasticity), Poisson's ratio (compressablity), 
Density, Plasti=
city parameters... Then the resulting objects can be 
simulated in real-tim=
e via Finite Element Analysis.. And fitness can be 
computed from the resul=
ts of the simulation.. 
It's difficult to discretize the output of the CPPN=
 into finite 
elements, so this is the major issue for building such a syst=
em.. But 
once such a system is built, it has unlimited potential for evolv=
ing 
any kind of structure...

Peter
